article_title: Obama Pulls Out 5 Rhetorical Stops in Immigration Speech

article_metadata.author: Jerry Weissman

og.description: President Obama’s presidency has been fraught with controversy and conflict over many issues, from his Affordable Care Act to his foreign policy on Syria, but none more so than immigration. His leadership skills have also come under fire, none more so that his ability to take decisive action. Some of [...]
